home.title: Your Journey
tips: Confidence starts with eye contact. Practice holding it for 3 seconds today.
The best conversations start with genuine curiosity. Ask 'why' more.
Your body language speaks before your words. Stand tall, shoulders back.
Rejection is redirection. Every 'no' brings you closer to the right 'yes'.
Listen more than you speak. The most attractive people make others feel heard.
Humor is your superpower. Don't take yourself too seriously.
A genuine compliment can make someone's entire day. Try it.
A no is better than not knowing.
Too late is a missed chance.
'I'll talk to her next time'... you won't.

coach.title: Coach {{name}}
coach.subtitle: Your AI dating coach
coach.greeting: Hey! I'm {{name}}, your dating coach. Think of me as that friend who's brutally honest but always has your back. What's on your mind?
coach.limitReached: You've used all your free messages for today. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited coaching!
coach.errorMessage: Sorry, I'm having trouble right now. Try again in a moment.
coach.welcomeDesc: Ask anything about dating, confidence, or social skills. Try the exercise modes above to practice opening lines, handle rejection, or simulate a first date.
coach.exerciseModesSubtitle: Sharpen your skills with interactive AI exercises

profile.title: Profile
profile.resetConfirm: Are you sure? This will delete all your progress.

welcome.title: Oh, you downloaded a dating app.
welcome.body:
Not a dating app. THE dating app.
The one that actually teaches you how to not be terrible at this.

Welcome to Charismo. We're about to turn your love life from a dumpster fire into... well, at least a campfire.

appearance.title: Pick your vibe.
appearance.subtitle: Light, dark, or let your phone decide. You can always change this later.
appearance.lightNote: Clean and bright, like your future love life
appearance.darkNote: Easy on the eyes, mysterious energy

gender.title: One important thing first.
gender.subtitle: This changes everything. (Literally, the whole app.)
gender.maleNote: Teach me to approach, charm, and not be awkward
gender.femaleNote: Teach me to attract, signal, and make him come to me
gender.diverseNote: Give me the best of both worlds
gender.footnote: Different game, different playbook. Same confidence.

socialEnergy.title: Quick question about your natural habitat.
socialEnergy.subtitle: Where do you recharge?
socialEnergy.introvert: My couch, my cat, my Netflix. People are... a lot.
socialEnergy.ambivert: I'm okay in groups but I need alone time to recover.
socialEnergy.extrovert: If there's no party, I AM the party. I collect humans.
socialEnergy.deepIntrovert: I ghost plans, avoid calls, and need a week to recover from a coffee date.
socialEnergy.footnote: No judgment. Okay, a little judgment.

ageGroup.title: How long have you been failing at this?
ageGroup.subtitle: (Kidding. Sort of.)
ageGroup.age_18_24: 18-24: I still think 'U up?' is a conversation starter.
ageGroup.age_25_34: 25-34: I've been hurt enough to download this app.
ageGroup.age_35_44: 35-44: I have a 401k but no one to share it with.
ageGroup.age_45_plus: 45+: I've got stories. Teach me the new rules.

male.title: Real talk: how's your grooming game?
male.subtitle: Hygiene, skincare, style: the stuff she notices first.
male.none: What's moisturizer? I use 3-in-1 shampoo for everything.
male.some: I shower daily and own deodorant. That counts, right?
male.solid: Skincare routine, nice clothes, I smell good.
male.mastered: I AM the routine. She asks ME for product recs.

female.title: Real talk: how's your style game?
female.subtitle: Skincare, outfits, hair: the stuff he notices first.
female.none: Messy bun, no makeup, hope nobody looks too close.
female.some: I have my go-to looks but I wouldn't call it a 'routine'.
female.solid: Skincare on lock, outfits curated, I get compliments.
female.mastered: I AM the Pinterest board. People screenshot my outfits.

diverse.title: Real talk: how's your glow-up game?
diverse.subtitle: Skincare, style, vibes: the stuff people notice first.
diverse.none: My look? It's called 'personality.' No further questions.
diverse.some: I have a routine. It's... occasional.
diverse.solid: Skincare, style, smelling good — the trifecta is covered.
diverse.mastered: I AM the aesthetic. People ask ME for recs.

skillLevel.title: How would you rate your game?
skillLevel.subtitle: (We totally are watching.)
skillLevel.question: How would you rate your flirting game right now?

male.beginner: What is flirting? I once waved at a girl and she called security.
male.intermediate: I can hold a conversation but closing? I'd rather do my taxes.
male.advanced: I do alright. I've had dates. Some even had second dates.
male.expert: I'm basically a menace. I just want to level up.
male.expertNote: Save some for the rest of us

female.beginner: I smile at my phone when he walks by. Does that count?
female.intermediate: I can hold eye contact for 2 seconds before panicking.
female.advanced: I've made guys approach me. Some even remembered my name.
female.expert: I'm a menace. I just want to level up my game.
female.expertNote: Save some for the rest of us, queen

diverse.beginner: What is flirting? I made eye contact once and it was an accident.
diverse.intermediate: I can be charming when I try. The 'try' part is key.
diverse.intermediateNote: You've got something. Let's unlock it.
diverse.advanced: I do alright. People seem to like me. I think.
diverse.expert: I'm dangerous. I just want more tools in my arsenal.
diverse.expertNote: Save some for the rest of us

goal.title: Last one. What are you actually here for?
goal.subtitle: (Pick the one that makes you feel the least attacked.)

male.socialConfidence: I just want to talk to people without my voice cracking.
male.getDates: I want to actually get dates. Like, real ones. In person.
male.findPartner: I want to find someone special. Preferably before I'm 80.
male.socialMagnetism: I want to be the person everyone wants to talk to at the party.
male.ambitious: Honestly? I want to pick up Victoria's Secret models.
male.ambitiousNote: Aim for the stars, king. We respect it.

female.socialConfidence: I want to walk into a room and not immediately find a wall to lean on.
female.getDates: I want HIM to approach ME. Repeatedly.
female.findPartner: I want to find someone special. On my terms.
female.socialMagnetism: I want to be the girl everyone gravitates toward.
female.ambitious: I want to have men wrapped around my finger. Respectfully.

diverse.socialConfidence: I just want to talk to people without my brain short-circuiting.
diverse.getDates: I want dates. Real ones. With people I actually like.
diverse.findPartner: I want to find someone special. On my own terms.
diverse.socialMagnetism: I want to be the person everyone gravitates toward at every party.
diverse.ambitious: I want everyone wrapped around my finger. Respectfully.

profileReveal.title: Alright, we've profiled you.
profileReveal.subtitle: Don't worry, we only use this power for good. Mostly.
profileReveal.basicsNote: Starting with the fundamentals. Trust the process.
profileReveal.settingsNote: You can change all of this in settings. We're flexible like that.

products.title: Recommended for you
products.disclaimer: We may earn a commission from purchases made through these links.

habits.title: Habits
habits.subtitle: Build your daily practice
habits.emptySubtitle: Start building daily habits from the chapters you learn
habits.archiveConfirm: Archive this habit? You can restore it later.

exercises.title: Practice Modes
exercises.subtitle: Sharpen your skills with AI exercises

quiz.title: Chapter Quiz
quiz.question: Question {{current}} of {{total}}
quiz.grade5: Perfect score! You nailed this chapter.
quiz.grade4: Great job! You really understand the material.
quiz.grade3: Solid! You got the key concepts.
quiz.grade2: Good start — revisiting the lessons might help.
quiz.grade1: No worries - review the chapter and try again!

voice.title: Voice Trainer
voice.instructions: Record yourself speaking for 10 seconds or more. We'll analyze your pace, filler words, and overall delivery.
voice.permissionDenied: Microphone permission is required to record.

voiceCoach.title: Voice Coach
voiceCoach.practiceDesc: Have a real-time voice conversation with your AI coach
voiceCoach.idleTip: Tap the call button to start a live voice conversation with your coach. Practice conversation, get feedback, or just chat.
voiceCoach.proPlusRequired: Pro+ subscription required for voice coaching

graduate.title: Congratulations!
graduate.subtitle: You've completed the journey
graduate.message: You've grown so much. You don't need us anymore. Go live your beautiful love story.
